title: EVA01
text: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627package mainimport ( "fmt" "sync" "time")//睡眠排序func main() { b := [7]int{1, 7, 3, 8, 5, 3, 4} var wg sync.WaitGroup for _, v := range b { wg.Add(1) v := v go func() { defer wg.Done() output1(v) }() } wg.Wait()}func output1(v int) { time.Sleep(time.Duration(v) * time.Second) fmt.Println(v)}

title: go-sleep
text: 12345678910111213141516171819//睡眠排序func main() { b := [7]int{1, 7, 3, 8, 5, 3, 4} var wg sync.WaitGroup for _, v := range b { wg.Add(1) v := v go func() { defer wg.Done() output1(v) }() } wg.Wait()}func output1(v int) { time.Sleep(time.Duration(v) * time.Second) fmt.Println(v)}

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
